General_Description: '''Plague of Villainy''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Greece]] is seeing an increasing amount of [[bandit]]s and [[Piracy|pirates]] taking advantage of the [[Peloponnesian War|war]]. Clear our country of these vermin."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew a number of bandits throughout Greece, and sank some pirate ships, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
